title: Ticket #3871: Log maxdelta and round robin iterations in negotiator
description: maxdelta isn't logged in the negotiator which makes it harder to debug. RR iterations aren't logged at the same level as allocation rounds.
remarks:
2013-Aug-25 14:02:11 by eje:
TESTING

configuration: 

NUM_CPUS = 10

# turn off D_FULLDEBUG output
NEGOTIATOR_DEBUG=

# make sure accounting group code path is in effect
GROUP_NAMES = a

With new code patch, you should see maxdelta output information, and also round-robin iteration information with "D_ALWAYS": 

$ tail -f NegotiatorLog | grep -e 'group quotas: groups=' -e 'entering RR iteration'
08/25/13 12:00:01 group quotas: groups= 2  requesting= 0  served= 0  unserved= 0  slots= 10  requested= 0  allocated= 0  surplus= 10  maxdelta= 10
08/25/13 12:00:01 group quotas: entering RR iteration n= 10

2014-Jan-29 16:55:22 by gthain:
CODE REVIEW Sorry this took so long to get to. Looks good, and if you want, you can merge to stable.
